message:
Ryt now I hav got a secret news from a CID person who is 1 of ma uncle,he said more den 1700 Hefajot E Islam has killd by Police,RAB,BGP n most of da dead bodies has been taken by da Soo clld Govt terrorist(Police,RAB,BGP) by trucks n no body knows whr been da dead bodies goin,ALLAH tumi shohid der k Jannatul Ferdous a kabol koro 

এক ফ্যান এর পাঠানো মেসেজ
